alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Upham, or 26 miles northeast of Minot, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Upham, Denbigh, and Bantry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
